Banner.Description: A passionate frontend developer with +4 year of experience in web development. A fast and efficient learner with deep understanding and a passion for software development.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hello! My name is Ahmed Mobasher graduated from faculty of computers & information zagazig university in 2017, After I had finished my militry period in 2019 I have started my career as a frontend developer at Meits Techonlogy .

Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had a good jounry while working at ITWORX Education , Softec Techologies where I learned a lot about Agile Methodology and how to write a Clean Code and building many websites and projects to practice our knowledge
Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Managed full-cycle design tasks, handling phases from conception to completion while maintaining guidelines throughout.
Developed designs to meet specific requirements such as quick-loading sites with particular layouts.
Collaborated with stakeholders during development processes to confirm creative proposals and design best practices.
Worked in Agile-driven environment to effectively maintain project timelines and utilize available resources.
